Default search would be by all parameters
Search could be by one player

This piechart compares quantity of all double errors of selected players.
In the middle of piechart quantity of matches between selected players.

Average for match:
This barchart compares quantity of double errors in every match.Dates of matches are in the bottom of barchart.Scroll left to see all data.

This piechart compares quantity of all unenforced errors of selected players.
In the middle of piechart quantity of matches between selected players.

Average for match:
This barchart compares quantity of unenforced errors in every match.Dates of matches are in the bottom of barchart.Scroll left to see all data.

This piechart compares quantity of all aces of selected players.
In the middle of piechart quantity of matches between selected players.

Average for match:
This barchart compares quantity of aces in every match.Dates of matches are in the bottom of barchart.Scroll left to see all data.

This piechart compares quantity of all winners of selected players.
In the middle of piechart quantity of matches between selected players.

Average for match:
This barchart compares quantity of winners in every match.Dates of matches are in the bottom of barchart.Scroll left to see all data.
This barchart compares different type of goals both players for the selected match.
This piechart shows what percent and what type of point player has won from total of the won points.
The number in the center of piechart is quantity of the won points.
Click on back arrow icon for return to score table.
Do you really want to redo previous point?
Do you really want to undo previous point?
The result could not to save, because the limit(20) to save the results for this version is over.\nDo you want to exit the match?
Do you want to save the result?
You are going to exit the match.\nDo you want to save the result?
Please enter a first name of a first player
Please enter a first name of a second player
The match lasts up to 10 victorious draws of one of players at a difference in the account not less than 2.At account 9:9 the game is played to a difference in the account in 2 points.
The match lasts 1 set.At account 6:6 the game tie-break is played.
The match lasts prior to a victory of one of players in 2 sets.At account 1:1 on sets king tie-break is played.
The match lasts prior to a victory of one of players in 2 sets.In a decisive set tie-break is played.
The match lasts prior to a victory of one of players in 2 sets.
The match lasts prior to a victory of one of players in 3 sets.In a decisive set tie-break is played.
The match lasts prior to a victory of one of players in 3 sets.
Some hints to upgrade game against
Continue to use your strengths competently. You surpass the sparring partner in quality of a game.
At the moment you use better your strengths.
Analyze, foresee, monitor the hits of the sparring partner. Do not play under strengths of the sparring partner.
Try to use better your strength.

You use your strengths well, but at the same time the sparring partner does not concede to you. Analyze, foresee, monitor the hits of the sparring partner. Do not play under strengths of the sparring partner.
Do not use risky or uncertain hits. Improve quality of his hits.
When you lead in the account, try new hits in a game against this sparring partner.
Try to load weak hits of the sparring partner.
Find and try to load weak hits of the sparring partner.
Exclude double errors from your game.
Exclude double errors from your game. Be aggressive on the second serve of the sparring partner.
Exclude double errors from your game. Be aggressive on the second serve of the sparring partner.
Try to aggravate your first serve. In a game with this sparring partner you do not make double errors.
You surpass the sparring partner in quality of serve.Use this advantage.
Improve quality of the serve and take the serve of the sparring partner better.
Don not rely on the serve, the sparring partner does not concede to you.
\u0020\u0020\u0020\u0020This application is developed especially for tennis amateurs who want to improve his tennis skills and create your own tennis history
\u0020\u0020- Keep a count of match with the help of this application.
\u0020\u0020- See/analyze the statistic during the match.
\u0020\u0020- Also you can pause/stop the match.
\u0020\u0020- Add the result of match in data base.

\u0020\u0020- In data base with the help of search find a required match and read the hints which could help you to improve your game against specified sparring partner(Hints are based on detailed statistic of the match).
\u0020\u0020- Also you can get hints and overall detailed statistic based on several matches between similar sparring partners.
Click on matchcard to see the detailed match statistic.
Long click on matchcard to delete or continue match.
When as a result of search in matches participate two players, "Overall statistic" is enable.
